datasets.description: This data contains the birthdate and the last known forward sortation area code of a student.  The legal guardian of a student provided this information.
datasets.name: BIRTHDATE_FORWARD_SORTATION_AREA.csv
datasets.title: Birthdate and Forward Sortation Area

datasets.description: This data contains a list of training programs taken by a participant. The data indicates if a participant was successful in completing a program, and the date participant received a credential. Only participants who successfully complete a program receive a credential.
datasets.name: TRAINING_YOUTH.csv
datasets.title: Performance in Training Programs

datasets.description: This data contains a list of courses taken by students during their secondary education; and the grade obtained in corresponding course.
datasets.name: SECONDARY_EDUCATION_FINAL_MARKS.csv
datasets.title: Final Marks from Secondary Education

datasets.description: This data contains a list of FSAs tests taken by students during their secondary education, and whether the grade in corresponding test met or exceeded expectations.
datasets.name: FOUNDATION_SKILLS_ASSESSMENT_EXPECTATION.csv
datasets.title: Foundation Skills Assessment Performance

datasets.description: This data contains a list of credentials received by students during their secondary education; and the year-month when corresponding credential was received; and the grade point average students obtained during their secondary education.
datasets.name: SECONDARY_EDUCATION_CREDENTIAL_INFORMATION.csv
datasets.title: Credentials from Secondary Education

datasets.description: This data contains a list of codes that indicate whether a student took special programs that might provide an advantage on a training program.
datasets.name: SECONDARY_EDUCATION_SPECIAL_PROGRAM_EDUCATION.csv
datasets.title: Participation on special programs during Secondary Education
